page.title: 14Byrkley Park Farm
page.content:
Byrkley Park Farm is built up of{450 {acres,}including{30 acres}of woodland and{100 acres}of rented land. There are four farms altogether belonging to{Thompstone Farms.}On the farm where I live there are two full-time workers. One of them is my Dad. There are three different kinds of animals.
{ Sheep} - there are 255 ewes, 5 tups, and approximately 500 lambs. { Pigs} - there are 90 sows, 4 boars, and approximately 700 young. { Cattle}- there are 250.
The rented land is used for grass, wheat, silage and spring barley. The rest of the land is used for grass, winter wheat, silage and winter barley.
